document_data.title: The Ugly Stick
document_data.mainbody: '''''The Ugly Stick''''' is a one round adventure module set in the [[Living City]] organized play program. It was published in August 1992 as the tenth Living City tournament module and is intended for adventurers of any level. The module received a reprint in ''[[Polyhedron 89]]'' in 1993.
document_data.Synopsis: A group of adventurers of the Living City set out to investigate customers of the famous [[Poston Plateau Resort]] mysteriously loosing their attractiveness. they discovered that a resort employee named [[Fawn (cleric)|Fawn]], an unnaturally beautiful [[cleric]], came to possess a duo of interconnected [[enchanted]] [[wand]]s. The ''[[wand of ugliness]]'', when used, made its target unattractive – an act of evil that shifted its wielder's personality towards maliciousness and evil. After being used, the ''wand of ugliness'' allowed the wielder to use the ''[[wand of beauty]]'' to beautify a target. Eventually, the adventurers reassembled special containers that neutralized both wands and their effects, and confronted Fawn.
